sources.title: Major Barbara
sources.description: Title: Major Barbara Summary: A young and idealistic woman, who has adopted the Salvation Army and whose father is an armament industrialist, will save more souls directing her father's business. A comedy with social commentary. Directed by: Gabriel Pascal, Harold French, David Lean Actors: Production Company: Gabriel Pascal Productions Release Date: 2 August 1941 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 A young and idealistic woman, who has adopted the Salvation Army and whose father is an armament industrialist, will save more souls directing her father's business. A comedy with social commentary.

metadata.Plot: A young and idealistic woman, who has adopted the Salvation Army and whose father is an armament industrialist, will save more souls directing her father's business. A comedy with social commentary.
metadata.Writer: George Bernard Shaw, Marjorie Deans, Anatole de Grunwald
metadata.Actors: Wendy Hiller, Rex Harrison, Robert Morley
